writings.text: 鶏口となるも牛後となるなかれ
鶏口となるも牛後となる勿れ

readings.text: けいこうとなるもぎゅうごとなるなかれ

glossary: better be first in a village than second at Rome
better be the head of a dog than the tail of a lion
better to be the mouth of a chicken than the rear end of a cow
